HealthcareProviderTaxonomy.name: HealthcareProviderTaxonomy
HealthcareProviderTaxonomy.description: Represents taxonomy or subspecialty codes for a practitioner or facility. A provider or facility can have multiple taxonomies.

AccountId.description: The business account associated with the provider taxonomy.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this taxonomy is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this taxonomy is no longer effective.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The healthcare provider associated with the taxonomy. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

IsPrimaryTaxonomy.description: Indicates whether the taxonomy is the provider's primary taxonomy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: Record ID in source system of provider directory.

TaxonomyId.description: Care taxonomy record associated with the provider taxonomy.
